name: EverFight
description: EverFight is a gaming platform that will feature several mini p2e NFT games on BSC with an NFT marketplace for the in-game Skins, Characters, Collectibles. There is a double token in the ecosystem, one working as a gateway for the gaming platform and the second used as a utility token inside the games/marketplace. EverFight allows anyone to earn AM and BNB tokens through skilled gameplay.
